turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order some coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have a specific store in mind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, the Starbucks inside the Birchwood mall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a Venti Java Chip.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any milk in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, whole milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get that with extra chocolate chips?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly. Would you like any sweetener or syrup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, chocolate syrup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That drink already comes with chocolate syrup. Would you like to add extra?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So just to confirm, you want a Venti Java Chip, extra chocolate chips and extra chocolate syrup. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, the order details will be sent to your email. Your order will be ready in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a wonderful day. Goodbye.
